name: FIFA Street 2
synopsis: FIFA Street 2 is second installment in EA's four-on-four soccer game. FIFA Street 2 will feature improved controls, many more tricks, and a new juggle mechanic. Take part in game modes, such as friendly, rule the street, and skills challenge. Choose from 20 national teams and 300-plus real-life soccer stars. There are 10 playable venues ranging from London's Westway Leisure Center to the sandy beaches of Brazil.
